parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of results to skip from the beginning of the available set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to read from the available set

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A specification of one or more fields to sort results by. Of format `<field> [asc | desc]`. Sortable Fields: [notification.createdOn]

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A specification of properties to <<filtering,filter>> results by. Of format `<filterKey>:<filterValue>`. Supported Filters: [notificationState, notificationType]

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Reduces returned resources to those created after/at the indicated <<schema,timestamp>>

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Reduces returned resources to those created before/at the indicated <<schema,timestamp>>
